properties.credits: Dr. Siobhan Drohan and Ms. Mairead Meagher, WIT.

title: Programming Fundamentals I
objectives: This is an introductory Programming module and assumes no prior knowledge of programming.

topics.title: Assignments
topics.objectives: The details of your assignments for Programming Fundamentals I is available here.

los.title: Assignment-1
los.objectives: This is your first assignment that will contribute to your grade for the module. You are asked to write a working animation. You will then be asked to present your code during your lab the week following submission.

los.title: Assignment-2
los.objectives: This is your second assignment that will contribute to your grade for the semester. You are asked to write a working animation. You will be asked to interview on your code during study week.
